title: The K's
text:
The K's are an English indie rock band from Earlestown, Merseyside. They are formed of singer/songwriter and guitarist Jamie Boyle, lead guitarist Ryan Breslin, bassist Dexter Baker and drummer Nathan Peers. They released their debut album, I Wonder If The World Knows?, on 5 April 2024. It debuted at number three on the UK Albums Chart on 12 April 2024.
The band won the "Breakthrough act of the year" award at the inaugural Northern Music Awards in 2024.


== Band members ==
Current members

Jamie Boyle – lead vocals, guitar (2016–present)
Ryan Breslin – guitar, backing vocals (2016–present)
Dexter Baker – bass guitar (2016–present)
Nathan Peers – drums (2023–present)
Former members

Chris Holleran - drums (2016-2018)
Jordan Holden – drums (2018–2022)
